amendment.description: Amendment sought to not allow the deployment of U.S. Armed Forces to Kosovo unless a peace agreement has been reached and the deployment has been approved by Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 52 and printed in the Congressional Record to not allow the deployment of U.S. Armed Forces to Kosovo unless a peace agreement has been reached and the deployment has been approved by Congress.

action.text: Mr. Moran (VA) raised a point of order against the Skelton amendment (A005). Mr. Moran stated that the amendment goes to a part of the bill already amended. The Chair sustained the point of order.
